program.name: Tk
program.configure: case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in x86_64*-linux*) ${SB_VAR_PERL}/bin/perl Makefile.PL PREFIX=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX} \ X11INC=/usr/X11R6/include X11LIB=/usr/X11R6/lib64 ;; *) ${SB_VAR_PERL}/bin/perl Makefile.PL PREFIX=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX} ;; esac
program.uninstall:
_installsitearch=$(${SB_VAR_PERL}/bin/perl -e \ 'use Config; print $Config{"installsitearch"} . "\n";')
cat ${_installsitearch}/auto/Tk/.packlist |\ while read _file; do rm ${_file}
_dir=$(dirname ${_file}) test -d ${_dir} && rmdir ${_dir} 2>/dev/null done
rm ${_installsitearch}/auto/Tk/.packlist rmdir ${_installsitearch}/auto/Tk 2>/dev/null
${SB_PATH_SED} -i -e "\ /head2.*L<Tk|/,/back/ { g N d }" ${_installsitearch}/perllocal.pod
